SELECT (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT ct.name FROM cargo_type ct WHERE ct.id = c.cargo_type_id) AND sc.locale= :locale) AS cargoTypeName, (SELECT d.cargo_sender_name) AS cargoSenderName, (SELECT d.cargo_receiver_name) AS cargoReceiverName, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT cp.name FROM cargo_producer cp WHERE cp.id = c.cargo_producer_id) AND sc.locale= :locale) AS cargoProducerName, (SELECT d.vehicle_type) AS vehicleType, (SELECT c.`count`) AS `count`, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT ut.short_name FROM unit_type ut WHERE ut.id = c.unit_type_id) AND sc.locale= :locale) AS unitTypeName
FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo d ON (c.document_cargo_id = d.id AND c.client_id = d.client_id AND c.department_id = d.department_id) WHERE d.department_id = :department AND d.created >= :startDate AND d.created <= :endDate ORDER BY {0} {1}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo d ON (c.document_cargo_id = d.id AND c.client_id = d.client_id AND c.department_id = d.department_id) WHERE d.department_id = :department AND d.created >= :startDate AND d.created <= :endDate
